paper_abstract: We show that asymptotically almost surely a tree with m edges decomposes the complete bipartite graph K-2m,K-2m, a result connected to a conjecture of Graham and Haggkvist. The result also implies that asymptotically almost surely a tree with m edges decomposes the complete graph with O(m(2)) edges. An ingredient of the proof consists in showing that the bipartition classes of the base tree of a random tree have roughly equal size.
paper_title: Almost Every Tree With m Edges Decomposes K-2m,K-2m
